header.description: Ported to Bedrock by queenbiscuit311, original by Poudingue. Consider supporting them over at https://www.patreon.com/Poudingue! If you play on java, check out the original Java version over at https://github.com/Poudingue/Vanilla-Normals-Renewed. I ported this pack to bedrock because it's my favorite vanilla-pbr conversion pack by far.
header.name: Vanilla Normals Renewed 1.0.7
